synopsis.text: Eleven-year-old Miho, a budding fashion designer, finds herself at odds with her family, who dismiss her creative aspirations. Yearning to showcase her talent, Miho dreams of designing a dress for the upcoming 'Disco Queen' contest, despite being too young to participate. When her younger sister, Shuri, secretly asks for her help to win the competition, Miho sees her chance to shine. However, her cruel aunt stands in her way, sabotaging Miho's creation. In a twist of fate, the Fairies of Fanland hear Miho's plea and transform her into Lala, a 16-year-old renowned fashion designer. Will Miho, as Lala, be able to overcome the obstacles and make her dreams a reality? Join Miho on her enchanting journey of determination, self-discovery, and a touch of magic in 'Fashion Lala'.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
